title: Prohibits the use of wireless telecommunications facilities on school property
summary: Prohibits the use of wireless telecommunications facilities on school property; defines "wireless telecommunications facility".
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1869

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 12, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. JEFFRIES, JAFFEE, DINOWITZ -- Multi-Sponsored by
         -- M. of A. McENENY, PEOPLES-STOKES, TOWNS -- read once  and  referred
         to the Committee on Local Governments

       AN  ACT  to  amend the general municipal law, in relation to prohibiting
         wireless communication facilities on school property

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  general  municipal  law  is  amended by adding a new
    2  section 79 to read as follows:
    3    S 79. PROHIBITION OF WIRELESS COMMUNICATION FACILITIES; SCHOOL PROPER-
    4  TY.  1. A MUNICIPAL CORPORATION OR OTHER ENTITY HAVING THE AUTHORITY  TO
    5  ISSUE  A  PERMIT  OR  LICENSE  TO  AUTHORIZE  THE PLACEMENT, ERECTION OR
    6  CONSTRUCTION OF A WIRELESS COMMUNICATION FACILITY  SHALL  PROHIBIT  SUCH
    7  PLACEMENT, ERECTION OR CONSTRUCTION OF SUCH FACILITIES ON SCHOOL GROUNDS
    8  OR  BUILDINGS  UNLESS  THE  APPLICANT  FOR  THE  PLACEMENT,  ERECTION OR
    9  CONSTRUCTION OF A WIRELESS COMMUNICATION FACILITY SHALL, IN ADDITION  TO
   10  COMPLIANCE WITH ANY OTHER LOCAL, STATE OR FEDERAL REQUIREMENT:
   11    A.  DEMONSTRATE  A COMPELLING REASON FOR THE PLACEMENT OF THE TOWER ON
   12  SCHOOL PROPERTY;
   13    B. PROVE IT IS A WIRELESS TELECOMMUNICATIONS  PROVIDER  WITH  A  VALID
   14  FEDERAL  COMMUNICATIONS  COMMISSION  LICENSE  TO  PROVIDE SERVICE TO THE
   15  AREA;
   16    C. PRESENT PROOF THAT ALTERNATIVE SITES HAVE BEEN CONSIDERED AND  THAT
   17  THE  SCHOOL  PROPERTY  IS THE ONLY SITE WHICH WILL NOT RESULT IN SIGNIF-
   18  ICANT GAPS IN COVERAGE THAT WOULD OTHERWISE  EXIST  IF  A  FACILITY  WAS
   19  PLACED ON ANY OF THE ALTERNATIVE SITES; AND
   20    D.  DEMONSTRATE THAT THE FACILITY SHALL EMIT THE LOWEST RADIOFREQUENCY
   21  EMISSION LEVEL PRACTICABLE.
   22    2. FOR THE PURPOSES OF THIS SECTION, "WIRELESS COMMUNICATION FACILITY"
   23  SHALL MEAN AN UNSTAFFED FACILITY USED IN THE RECEIPT AND TRANSMISSION OF
   24  WIRELESS TELEPHONE SERVICE, INCLUDING, BUT  NOT  LIMITED  TO,  ANTENNAS,

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
